00035         function addFields_controller($config) {
00036                 $optionList[0] = array(0 => "Single Page", 1 => "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default");
00037                 $optionList[1] = array(0 => "Multi Page", 1 => "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Multistep");
00038                 $config['items'] = $optionList;
00039                 return $config;
00040         }

00051         function addFields_predefinedJS($config) {
00052                 $newRecord = 'true';
00053                 if ($config['row']['pi_flexform'] != '') {
00054                         $flexData = t3lib_div::xml2array($config['row']['pi_flexform']);
00055                         if (isset($flexData['data']['sDEF']['lDEF']['predefined'])) {
00056                                 $newRecord = 'false';
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059                 $uid = key($GLOBALS['SOBE']->editconf['tt_content']);
00060                 if($uid < 0 || empty($uid) || !strstr($uid,'NEW')) {
00061                         $uid = $GLOBALS['SOBE']->elementsData[0]['uid'];
00062                 }
00063                 //print_r($GLOBALS['SOBE']->elementsData[0]);
00064                 
00065                 $js = "<script>\n";
00066                 $js .= "/*<![CDATA[*/\n";
00067                 
00068                 $divId = $GLOBALS['SOBE']->tceforms->dynNestedStack[0][1];
00069                 if(!$divId) {
00070                         //$divId = 'DTM-' . $uid;
00071                         $divId = "DIV.c-tablayer";
00072                 } else {
00073                         $divId .= "-DIV";
00074                 }
00075                 $js .= "var uid = '" . $uid . "'\n";
00076                 $js .= "var flexformBoxId = '" . $divId . "'\n";
00077                 //$js .= "var flexformBoxId = 'DIV.c-tablayer'\n";
00078                 $js .= "var newRecord = " . $newRecord . "\n";
00079                 $js .= file_get_contents(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus') . 'Resources/JS/addFields_predefinedJS.js');
00080                 $js .= "/*]]>*/\n";
00081                 $js .= "</script>\n";
00082                 return $js;
00083         }

00091         function addFields_predefined ($config) {
00092 
00093                 global $LANG;
00094 
00095                 
00096                 $pid = $config['row']['pid'];
00097                 if($pid < 0) {
00098                         $contentUid = str_replace('-','',$pid);
00099                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery('pid','tt_content','uid='.$contentUid);
00100                         if($res) {
00101                                 $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00102                                 $pid = $row['pid'];
00103                                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106                 $ts = $this->loadTS($pid);
00107                 
00108                 $predef = array();
00109 
00110                 # no config available
00111                 if (!is_array($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.']) || sizeof($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.']) == 0) {
00112                         $optionList[] = array(0 => $LANG->sL('LLL:EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang_db.xml:be_missing_config'), 1 => '');
00113                         return $config['items'] = array_merge($config['items'],$optionList);
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 # for each view
00117                 foreach($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.'] as $key=>$view) {
00118 
00119                         if (is_array($view)) {
00120                                 $beName = $view['name'];
00121                                 if (!$predef[$key]) $predef[$key] = $beName;
00122                         }
00123                 }
00124 
00125                 $optionList = array();
00126                 $optionList[] = array(0 => $LANG->sL('LLL:EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang_db.xml:be_please_select'), 1 => '');
00127                 foreach($predef as $k => $v) {
00128                         $optionList[] = array(0 => $v, 1 => $k);
00129                 }
00130                 $config['items'] = array_merge($config['items'],$optionList);
00131                 return $config;
00132         }
00133 
00140         function loadTS($pageUid) {
00141                 $sysPageObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_pageSelect');
00142                 $rootLine = $sysPageObj->getRootLine($pageUid);
00143                 $TSObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_tsparser_ext');
00144                 $TSObj->tt_track = 0;
00145                 $TSObj->init();
00146                 $TSObj->runThroughTemplates($rootLine);
00147                 $TSObj->generateConfig();
00148                 return $TSObj->setup;
00149         }
00150 }
